events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago and the shipment still hasn't arrived. The tracking number shows no updates.
The issue has been identified as a delivery delay based on the customer's mention of late shipment and lack of tracking updates.
Routing this case to the delivery support team to assist the customer with the delayed shipment.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us about your order delay. Iâ€™m here to help you track down your shipment and resolve this issue.
Could you please provide your order number and the tracking number you have so I can check the status for you?
Sure, my order number is 123456789 and the tracking number is TRK987654321. The tracking page still says 'label created' with no further updates.
Thanks for the info. I've contacted the shipping provider and it appears there was a delay at the local distribution center. We expect delivery within 3 business days.
Okay, I appreciate the update. I hope it gets delivered soon as I really need the item this week.
We will monitor the shipment and notify you when it is out for delivery. Please let us know if the package does not arrive within 3 days.
Just checking in to confirm if your order has arrived. We want to make sure everything is resolved to your satisfaction.
Yes, the package arrived today. Thank you for your help and prompt response to the delay!
Glad to hear your order was delivered. We are closing this case now. Feel free to contact us anytime for further assistance.
